text: Michael J. Cleary (1 September 1925 â€“ 3 September 2020) was an Irish-born Gambian Roman Catholic prelate. He was the Roman Catholic Bishop Emeritus of the Diocese of Banjul in Gambia. He was born in Brickens, County Mayo, Ireland. Cleary was made a priest on 29 June 1952. On 24 January 1981, he was made Bishop of the Diocese of Banjul.Ordination of Bishop Cleary Cleary retired on 25 February 2006. Cleary died on 3 September 2020, aged 95. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Irish people Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:Gambian people
title: Michael J. Cleary
